original_text: Elihu was also angry with Job's three friends. They had not been able to find an answer to Job's problem. But they still said that Job was guilty.
korean_text: 또 세 친구에게 화를 냄은 그들이 능히 대답하지 못하면서도 욥을 정죄함이라

sentences.original_text: Elihu was also angry with Job's three friends
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리후도 욥의 세 친구들에게 화가 났습니다

sentences.original_text: They had not been able to find an answer
